entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early in the evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
